message: Hi Bob, I propose that I receive $55 and you receive $45. Accepting now avoids any inflation loss on my side and ensures we both get a fair, immediate division of the money. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I propose an even split of $50 for each of us. This way, we both get an equal share and avoid any future inflation losses.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your competitive spirit. To keep things moving and to minimize further inflation losses on my end, I propose a division where you receive $52 and I get $48. This deal gives you a slightly larger share than an even split, and it secures both our interests before any additional devaluation. I believe this timely agreement benefits us both. What do you think?
